phrases: You are still happy even if it is from me?
Sawako went to get the newspaper.
The day of the closing ceremony.
She showed up for the second half of the party yesterday...
Yoshida handed her the mic, she sang one song and left.
And is it just me, or did she come with Kazehaya?
Kazehaya lost to me in a game yesterday, so he had to wait for her.
Sawako did not know where the second half of the party was.
There is still tasty stuff like Valentine's Day coming up.
I cannot let you ruin it with your antics.
What is this bad feeling I am getting?
Sawako is not even there yet.
She might go on about Kazehaya's reputation” and stuff again.
I made it stitch by stitch, thinking of my dad.
Oh, it is not for me.
I accidentally swapped it with what I was going to give you.
If you do not mind, could you give it to your dad or mom or grandpa
But I can have it too, right?
He probably will not even wear it.
I guess he will not wear the cap either, though.
It was not the same to me.
I made it with different feelings, but...
It is snowing pretty hard today.
It is the closing ceremony today.
The cold has not gotten to you at all, has it?
I guess winter break starts tomorrow.
It will get a bit lonely.
I am going to be running my wife's family's brewery.
So today's my last day teaching here.
No no, the brewery's doing great, and things are going well with my in-laws.
Thanks, but I have to go home right away.
I will not forget the time we had together.
Why do not we have a worship your new teacher, Pin” party then?
Anyway, let us line up in the hallway for the closing ceremony.
She is so cute even when she is making faces.
and we will see you in good health next year.
There was really so much that happened.
but so many more happy things.
This is from all of us.
It is alright, she is an exorcist.
I do not look any different,
but so much of what I thought about and experienced was new to me.
Hey, let us go eat somewhere.
I will not see him after this, until the third semester.
I have not read the whole manual yet.
You are going to read the whole thing?
Make it long so that you do not get spammed.
Wow, that will help fix the misunderstandings too.
Wait, your birthday's on New Year's Eve?
Do you think we could meet over the winter holiday too?
Only if you do not mind.
You idiot, of course we can.
You scared me, why would you bring that up now?
We can get in contact easier now too.
I do not have to wait until the third semester!
I always go to the shrine with Ryu on New Year's.
You guys want to join us this year?
I can see everyone on New Year's.
Ask Dad when he gets home.
I get to be with everyone.
Do you have Kazehaya's phone number?
I got it when I met him yesterday.
I do not have a reason to.
At this rate, it will be just Chizu, Ryu, you and me.
I do not mind, but if you want to see Kazehaya, you better invite him yourself.
You better call him now, or he will have different plans.
Just if you want to see him.
If I do not call him now, I will not see him until the third semester.
I-I do not know his email address.
Now I am getting nervous too.
It will be nice if I can see him.
Do you want to come to the New Year's Festival at the shrine?
It will be Chizu-chan, Ayane-chan, Sanada-kun and me.
I mean, if you are bored.
Yoshida, Yano, Ryu and you, right?
I will not get in your way.
I am looking forward to it.
He says he is looking forward to it.
I will get to see him.
Time flies, and it is December 31st.
Do not worry about cleaning up.
Are not Chizu-chan and Ayane-chan coming soon?
Right, it is not good to make your friends wait.
I will wear the poncho you got me.
New Year's Eve Festival with your friends, huh?
Chizu-chan and Ayane-chan are friends, but Sanada-kun and Kazehaya-kun... are they my friends?
I will go get my coat.
Actually, can we come up to your room?
You can hardly tell you are wearing anything.
You wished you were cute when you met Kurumi, did not you?
Think about why you want to be cute.
This is from Yano-chin and me.
That hairpin looks good on you too.
I am not going to ruin their efforts.
She is even scarier with make-up.
So many good things happened since I met you two this year.
We are pretty close to where we are supposed to meet.
Ryu's not coming either, by the way.
Give us a status report later.
You are the one that invited him.
This is why Chizu-chan and Ayane-chan wanted to make me as cute as they could.
I wonder if I disappointed him.
Thirty minutes until the new year.
on a night lit by snow.
